Title: The Other Barrio
Writer: Dante Betteo, Richard Montoya, Alejandro Murguia (short story The Other Barrio)
Actors: Veronica Valencia, Melinna Bobadilla, Vincent Calvarese, Nestor Cuellas
Plot: In "The Other Barrio" housing inspector Roberto Morales investigates the suspicious circumstances of a fatal fire in a residential hotel and finds himself drawn into a web of bribery, corruption and murder.
